title: Chan-young
text:
Chan-young, Chan-yeong, or Chan-yong is a Korean masculine given name. The meaning differs based on the <a href="hanja">hanja</a> used to write each syllable of the name. There are 20 hanja with the reading "<a href="Chan%20%28Korean%20name%29">Chan</a>" and 34 hanja with the reading "<a href="Young%20%28Korean%20name%29">young</a>" on the South Korean government's official list of hanja which may be registered for use in given names.
People with this name include:
